file_content.text: You've done well, now watch you do not go insane.
Your archaeologist team is dead, killed for the relics they uncovered. I have them now.
Interesting. The Dark Temple's presence continues to surprise and fascinate. I'll quarantine the artifacts for future study.
A shame we lost the whole team. At least it wasn't a total loss. After all, we got what we came for.
Hmm, an accurate assessment. But the Reclamation Service will honor their loss.
I'll tell the Reclamation Service to name a hallway after you.
Whatever secrets these pieces hide, we'll find them. Thank you.
Can you feel the power in the air?
